item.title: Problem: SSIS: 'Hresult: 0x800703E6 Description: Invalid access to memory location'
item.description: Problem came up trying to connect to a remote Oracle source: Started: 12:03:03 Error: 2013-10-09 12:03:03.84 Code: 0xC0202009 Source: Description: SSIS Error Code DTS_E_OLEDBERROR. An OLE DB error has occurred. Error code: 0x800703E6. An OLE DB record is available. Source: "Microsoft OLE DB Service Components" Hresult: 0x800703E6 Description: "Invalid access to memory location.". End Error Error: 2013-10-09 12:03:03.84 Code: 0xC020801C Source: Copy Data Description: SSIS Error Code DTS_E_CANNOTACQUIRECONNECTIONFROMCONNECTIONMANAGER. The AcquireConnection method call to the connection manager "xxx" failed with error code 0xC0202009.
